TopicTitle: My Bi-plane is now a sea-plane

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I done made my bi-plane into a working seaplane.

I added more fuel so she can go to the island land a few times and come back. I lovely day out!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I have tested it a bit and it seems to be fine to land at anything up to 100m/s. Anything above that and its very hard to keep level.

Taking off is pretty much the same as on land. It does bounce a bit which is quite fun!

Landing gear are action grouped 1 as toggle.

A video of the water landing, take off and runway landing:

Thanks for looking!

MJ

DOWNLOAD
That plane reminds me of the Cessna in FSX With the floats, Fantastic work!!!
Nice idea transform the biplane into a beautifull seaplane well done!
That is really nice. I tried to get my monoplane to do this but I couldn't get the floats to look like floats. I was using the detachable hardpoints since they have a 9999m/s thing on them.
